title: Welcome note
content: This is the first sample note inserted via CSV.

title: Audit intro
content: Showing how auditing captures creators.

title: Liquibase seed
content: Data seeded through Liquibase loadData.

title: MapStruct demo
content: DTO mapping handled by MapStruct.

title: Springdoc info
content: Swagger UI documents these endpoints.

title: H2 access
content: H2 is exposed via TCP for tooling.

title: Pagination
content: Paged results are supported via Pageable.

title: Auditor header
content: Pass X-User to populate audit fields.

title: Update endpoint
content: PUT /api/notes/{id} updates title/content.

title: Delete endpoint
content: DELETE /api/notes/{id} removes a note.

title: Concurrency check
content: Demonstrates optimistic updates in service layer.

title: Validation
content: Note requests enforce title/content length and not blank.

title: Auditing default
content: Without X-User header, auditor defaults to system.

title: Paging default
content: Pageable defaults configured via application.yml.

title: Swagger header
content: X-User header documented in Swagger UI.

title: Sequence id
content: IDs are generated from note_seq sequence.

title: Liquibase load
content: CSV seed inserted by Liquibase changeSet 2.

title: Record DTOs
content: NoteDTO and request DTOs use Java records.

title: MapStruct update
content: Update uses mapper to merge request into entity.

title: H2 TCP
content: H2 exposed on 9092 for external tooling.
